reviews.text: Loved this experience! The restaurant has 360 views of Bratislava - it also resolved around slowly. Good service and food was amazing! Limited choice however and not child friendly menu. Best for couples dining.

Nice place which seems to be located in the middle of the woods, in fact it's basically in "relax area" sorrounded by woods. I can imagine to be here often if I would be living in Bratislava.
The tower itself is majestic from outside' view, diamond-like shape looks really interesting.
In order to get to skies (D floor;) ) you have to pay 3 Euro per person to bar tender at ground floor bar,interesting solution;)
Views from the top are great, you can see even Vienna.
Recommended to visit this place once in Bratislava.
On the view sqare was awfull smell as soviet sausages. It is better to go only to the restaurant. It  was quite nice, the view - same, but aperoll schpritz was poor.

The las portion to the tower we did it by foot, there is also public transport and is very accessible. The tower itself is easy to access and the person's at the bottom can instruct you. There is a cost for visiting of 6 €, but if you take main course in the restaurant they will deduct it. As for the view is something breath taking, I would recommend having lunch or dinner since the floor in the sestaurant is rotating while u have your meal and can see all the sides. The staff at the restaurant are as best as a waiter can get. Prices are decent, to bad the menu has a small variety of products that you can chose, but sufficient to cover a decent lunch/dinner.

I would recommend it 100%, it is a experience that u don't get so often.
Worth doing if you are in the area! Great views! Don't need to go to the restaurant just pay admission as you enter the building!
